
module "lambda_functions" {

  source = "./modules/lambda"
  common = local.common
  service_name = var.service_name
  app_path = var.app_path

  apigw_execution_arns = module.api_gateway.apigw_execution_arns
  
  runtime = "${TERRAYML_RUNTIME}"

  lambda_function_list = ${LAMBDA_FUNCTIONS_LIST}
  lambda_events_list = ${LAMBDA_EVENTS_LIST}
}
